resources.string: Welcome, here are the basics. The important thing is to get to the top of the leaderboard and collect rewards.
You can be a visitor here.
You can log in and register here via Email.
It\'s a little complicated this way. Let\'s explain the details.
This is the part where your life count is. You can collect lives by clicking on this heart every hour.
This is the part where your level is. Depending on your level, you will move up the ranking table.
This is the sorting part. You can see how many levels there are at the highest level and where you rank.
This is the menu opening section, let\'s look inside.
The important part of the menu is that if you have not logged in with your e-mail, you can verify it here.
This is the part where your luck is written. Your chance increases or decreases by -2% each time you level up, and by +2% each time you fail to level up.
This is our television. It doesn\'t work when you\'re not playing.
If you use this gamepad, an image will appear on the television and you will know whether you won or lost.
Could you share your first impression with us?
